ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: My provider knows who I want involved in my care if my symptoms get worse.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: In the past year, it was easy to contact my provider when I had questions.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: In the past year, my provider and I have talked about whether I am experiencing any symptoms of my illness.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: In the past year, I have talked to my provider about ways I can tell when symptoms of my illness are coming back.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: In the past year, my provider and I have talked about ways to cope with symptoms of my illness.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: General Communication part A Total Score
Have you had symptoms of your illness in the past year?
In the past year, it has been easy to contact my provider when I needed help with symptoms of my illness.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: In the past year, I have talked to my provider when symptoms of my illness were getting worse.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: In the past year, my provider has included me in discussions about treating symptoms of my illness when they were getting worse.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: In the past year, my provider has listened to suggestions I had about how to manage symptoms of my illness.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: General Communication Part B Total Score
